summary: Two couples of Italian immigrants are part of a game that leads to treason and brings serious consequences to those who lose.
cast: Glória Pires|Patricia Pillar|Alexandre Paternost|Bruno Campos|Gianfrancesco Guarnieri|José Lewgoy|Cecil Thiré|Cláudio Mamberti|Antônio Carlos|Arcangelo Zorzi|José Vitor Castiel|Fábio Barreto|Julia Barreto|Mariana Pellegrino Barreto|Elaine Braghirolli|Oldina Cerutti Do Monte|María Díaz|Alceu Ferraro|Renato Filippini|Tereza Fortuna|Diego Galafassi|Daniel Gatelli|António Giacomoni|Hugo Lorensati|Thiago Lorensati|Gonçalo Mascia|Ana Parenti|Antoine Parenti|Pedro Parenti|Cleri Pelizza|André Piccoli|José Clemente Pozenato|Ceres Ramos|Flávio Rizzi|Borba Sidnei|Milton Stumpf|Lídia Tonus|Nadir Tonus|Wilson Toscan|João Wianey|Inés Zorzi|Pedro Zorzi
title: El cuarteto
